summary:
"The Little Mermaid" is a popular 1989 Disney movie based on a fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen. It tells the story of Ariel, a mermaid princess who wants to be human and falls in love with a prince named Eric. She makes a deal with a sea witch, Ursula, to become human temporarily.

The movie was a big success, winning two Academy Awards and making lots of money. It started a new era for Disney, called the Disney Renaissance, with many more successful movies. Today, it's still loved and has been made into a stage musical and a live-action film.
title: The Little Mermaid (1989 film)
